about.title: about me
about.p1: My name is Kateřina Hladíková and I am a front-end developer with a passion for creating clear, functional, and user-friendly websites. After several years of studying a different profession, I decided to change direction and devote myself fully to what I really enjoy!
about.p2: As part of my retraining, I learned HTML, CSS, Tailwind, JavaScript, React, and Next.js. I continue to develop my skills gradually. I have a flair for design, an eye for detail, and a desire to constantly learn.
about.p3: I am currently looking for opportunities where I can apply my knowledge in real projects, grow alongside more experienced colleagues, and contribute not only with my enthusiasm but also with a fresh perspective.
